channel.title: DevHawk tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from DevHawk.

item.description: It's rare, but it SUCKS when @msonenote sync infrastructure is offline...as it appears to be now.
item.source:markdown: It's rare, but it *SUCKS* when @msonenote sync infrastructure is offline...as it appears to be now.

item.description:
Today's Workout : 5x5x325# squats, 5x5x325# overhead press, 1x5x375# deadlift. #StrongLifts5x5

Those weights are 5% off recent pace. I take it easier on Tuesdays because of Sunday hockey. My 50+ year old body doesn't recover like it used to .

As @garyshort pointed out, the 325# overhead press is a typo. Should be 125#
item.source:markdown:
Today's Workout : 5x5x325# squats, 5x5x325# overhead press, 1x5x375# deadlift. #StrongLifts5x5
Those weights are 5% off recent pace. I take it easier on Tuesdays because of Sunday hockey. My 50+ year old body doesn't recover like it used to .
As @garyshort pointed out, the 325# overhead press is a typo. Should be 125#

item.description:
Today's workout: 340# squat, 200# bench, 180# barbell rows. 5x5 worksets #strongLifts5x5

Haven't posted workout in a while, but since @gsmachado wondered if I broke my phone on gym equipment, I figured I should post what has actually been going on at the gym 3 days per week.
item.source:markdown:
Today's workout: 340# squat, 200# bench, 180# barbell rows. 5x5 worksets #strongLifts5x5
Haven't posted workout in a while, but since @gsmachado wondered if I broke my phone on gym equipment, I figured I should post what has actually been going on at the gym 3 days per week.

item.description: @gsmachado @GrantShares @Neo_Blockchain @coz_official @NEOnewstoday @NeoResearch_NEO @ax_labs @rendongliu @NE0NEXT @neospcc @Red4Sec @john_devadoss I dropped it after I got home from the gym..slipped out of my hand as I was grabbing groceries from car, so that's more to blame than the squats

item.description:
One of Tony's castmates was wearing a Browncoats t shirt with "I aim to misbehave" on the back. I was thus inspired to watch Serenity.

The first 25 minutes of Serenity are stunning. The rest of the movie is great, but the opening is absolutely perfect.

https://t.co/3r6SAAY83Z

https://t.co/mXjNGvbH7U
item.source:markdown:
One of Tony's castmates was wearing a Browncoats t shirt with "I aim to misbehave" on the back. I was thus inspired to watch Serenity.
The first 25 minutes of Serenity are stunning. The rest of the movie is great, but the opening is absolutely perfect.
https://t.co/3r6SAAY83Z
https://t.co/mXjNGvbH7U

item.description:
SpongeBob the Musical is a truly ridiculous show. Regardless, Issaquah Kidstage is a fantastic production of this ridiculous show. So glad that Tony has been a part of it.

I am privileged that I often get to hear other people cheer for my kids. Patrick on ice, Tony on stage.
item.source:markdown:
SpongeBob the Musical is a truly ridiculous show. Regardless, Issaquah Kidstage is a fantastic production of this ridiculous show. So glad that Tony has been a part of it.
I am privileged that I often get to hear other people cheer for *my* kids. Patrick on ice, Tony on stage.

item.description: Opening night, Village Theatre Kidstage SummerStock production of SpongeBob SquarePants the Musical... Featuring my son #ProudDad https://t.co/2Ot1ZDKZms
item.source:markdown: Opening night, Village Theatre Kidstage SummerStock production of SpongeBob SquarePants the Musical... Featuring my son #ProudDad https://t.co/2Ot1ZDKZms
